title.narrative: Suppport to the National Bank of Ukraines Research Department

description.narrative:
Insatsen avser tillhandahållande av stöd till Ukrainas centralbank (NBU) från Svenska Riksbanken. Riksbanken och NBU har ett framgångsrikt samarbete inom ramen för SIDA-finansierade "Riksbanken 2015-2018" globala insats som stöder kapacitetsutveckling i utvalda Sida partnerländer. NBU har begärt ytterligare stöd från Riksbanken för stöd till att inrätta en forskningsfunktion som Riksbanken har svarat positivt på. Eftersom detta stöd är av en omfattning som inte ryms i den globala insatsen har ambassaden i Kiev beslutat att tillhandahålla ytterligare medel för att möjliggöra ett fördjupat samarbete.
NBU anses vara en välfungerande institution och har en central roll i stabiliseringen av Ukrainska ekonomin och i att främjandet av hållbar ekonomisk tillväxt. Förbättrad forskningskapacitet skulle bidra till att skapa bättre förutsättningar för NBU att genomföra dessa funktioner.

This contribution concerns the provision of support to the National Bank of Ukraine (NBU) from the Swedish Central Bank (Riksbanken). The Riksbank and NBU have had a very succesful cooperation within the context of the Sida-funded 'Riksbanken 2015-2018' global contribution that supports Central Banks in selected Sida partner countries. The NBU has requested additional support from Riksbanken to help establish a research function at the NBU to which Riksbanken has responded positivley. As this support goes beyond the global contribution the Embassy has decided to provide additional funding to facilitate this cooperation through a separate contribution.
The NBU is considered to be a well functioning institution and has a key role to play in stabilising the Ukranian economy and creating the conditions for sustainable economic growth. An increased capacity to undertake macroeconomic research would help support the NBU in carrying out this role.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: Results of the intervention include research papers on key priorities to the National Bank of Ukraines work in the upcoming years. These papers focused on disinflationary measures, capital requirements and deleveraging for private banks. The Riksbank seconded expert supported the NBU in developing qualitative research papers on relevant topics, both for publication but also for internal capacity building (through open research seminars). Additionally the expert supported the NBU in the organisational development of the NBU's research department.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
